title: MD
biography: Anil Kakodkar (medical-tech crossover) is a leading specialist in Radiation Applications - Nuclear medicine support at BARC.
aiSummary: Anil Kakodkar (medical-tech crossover) is a radiation applications - nuclear medicine support specialist with an H-index of 110 at BARC (Faculty). Has been published in Pharmaceutical science advances. Based in India.
